name: Key Runner (Matt Kieran)
description:
Key Runner is a chill puzzle game kind of like Mask of the Tomb, except this one can be solved perfectly without stopping. Please give it a try and let me know how far you can get before getting bored or stuck.

This is my first and only game so far and I'd love to hear your feedback and any ideas you might have to improve it. Thanks for checking it out. Peace.
